column4: I have a very strange problem, like a memory leak.  I recently installed Ubuntu on a laptop that functions as a router.  It runs DHCP Server 3, has a few ip tables rules, and ssh.  Over a week, the time to connect via ssh slows down, then will not accept any, and at that point DHCP server stops giving out ips, but the iptable rules still work.
It's like it will not start any more threads
Are there utilities to see how ram is used by programs / what could be kiling the machine?
